name: Swe (old game project)
description:
shooter , single player game :) (not recommended on web(you cant open settings and other alot of bugs on webgl))

Swe , is a game that i was working on at the start of game dev and now i remember it and i decided that i wanna share it with you guys , it has a lot of bugs but it wont be fixed , sadly it has a lot of bugs that is not understandable ? because i forgot the project and i dont know how to work with it anymore but here we go ... atleast we have a game here :'D

tell me your thoughts (that is if you are reading)
